author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and crafted the sound design for this captivating video showcasing the San Francisco Bay Area in the 1950s. It takes you on a drive through the city, offering a nostalgic journey back in time.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

B&W Video Source: Prelinger Archives
B&W Video Source Credits: Produced by Progressive Pictures, Oakland, California. Director: Ray Bainbridge

Join this channel to benefit from exclusive advantages and also to support us: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1W8ShdwtfgjRHdbl1Lctcw/join
title: 1950s - Driving in California in color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design Added
